atk-s0403a40:2_0: 13. Dutiyassa tatiye nālanti na yuttaṁ nānucchavikaṁ. Na manāpenāti na manamhi appanakena
atk-s0403a40:2_1: ākārena nisinnāsanato paccuṭṭhenti, anādarameva dassenti. Santamassa pariguhantīti
atk-s0403a40:2_2: vijjamānampi deyyadhammaṁ etassa niguhanti paṭicchādenti. Asakkaccaṁ denti no sakkaccanti
atk-s0403a40:2_3: lūkhaṁ vā hotu paṇītaṁ vā, asahatthā acittīkārena denti, no cittīkārena.
atk-s0403a40:4_0: 14. Catutthe ubhatobhāgavimuttoti dvīhi bhāgehi vimutto, arūpasamāpattiyā rūpakāyato
atk-s0403a40:4_1: vimutto, maggena nāmakāyato. So catunnaṁ arūpasamāpattīnaṁ ekekato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre
atk-s0403a40:4_2: sammasitvā arahattaṁ pattānaṁ catunnaṁ, nirodhā vuṭṭhāya arahattaṁ pattaanāgāmino
atk-s0403a40:4_3: ca vasena pañcavidho hoti. Pāḷi panettha “katamo ca puggalo ubhatobhāgavimutto? Idhekacco
atk-s0403a40:4_4: puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā
atk-s0403a40:5_0: Paññāya vimuttoti paññāvimutto. So sukkhavipassako, catūhi jhānehi vuṭṭhāya arahattaṁ
atk-s0403a40:5_1: pattā cattāro cāti imesaṁ vasena pañcavidho hoti. Pāḷi panettha aṭṭhavimokkhapaṭikkhepavaseneva
atk-s0403a40:5_2: āgatā. Yathāha – “na heva kho aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa
atk-s0403a40:5_3: disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti. Ayaṁ vuccati puggalo paññāvimutto”ti.
atk-s0403a40:6_0: Phuṭṭhantaṁ sacchikatoti kāyasakkhī. So jhānaphassaṁ paṭhamaṁ phusati, pacchā nirodhaṁ
atk-s0403a40:6_1: nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti. So sotāpattiphalaṭṭhaṁ ādiṁ katvā yāva arahattamaggaṭṭhā chabbidho
atk-s0403a40:6_2: hoti. Tenāha – “idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya
atk-s0403a40:6_3: cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti. Ayaṁ vuccati puggalo kāyasakkhī”ti.
atk-s0403a40:7_0: Diṭṭhantaṁ pattoti diṭṭhippatto. Tatridaṁ saṅkhepalakkhaṇaṁ – dukkhā saṅkhārā, sukho
atk-s0403a40:7_1: nirodhoti ñātaṁ hoti diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phusitaṁ paññāyāti diṭṭhippatto.
atk-s0403a40:7_2: Vitthārato pana sopi kāyasakkhī viya chabbidho hoti. Tenevāha – “idhekacco puggalo
atk-s0403a40:7_3: ‘idaṁ dukkha’nti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti…pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ
atk-s0403a40:7_4: pajānāti, tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā paññāya…pe…
atk-s0403a40:8_0: Saddhāya vimuttoti saddhāvimutto. Sopi vuttanayeneva chabbidho hoti. Tenāha – “idhekacco
atk-s0403a40:8_1: puggalo ‘idaṁ dukkha’nti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti…pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti
atk-s0403a40:8_2: yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā
atk-s0403a40:8_3: paññāya…pe… no ca kho yathādiṭṭhippattassa. Ayaṁ vuccati puggalo saddhāvimutto”ti.
atk-s0403a40:8_4: Etassa hi saddhāvimuttassa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe saddahantassa viya okappentassa
atk-s0403a40:8_5: viya adhimuccantassa viya ca kilesakkhayo hoti, diṭṭhippattassa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe
atk-s0403a40:8_6: kilesacchedakañāṇaṁ adandhaṁ tikhiṇaṁ sūraṁ hutvā vahati. Tasmā yathā nāma nātitikhiṇena
atk-s0403a40:8_7: asinā kadaliṁ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṁ maṭṭhaṁ na hoti, asi sīghaṁ na vahati, saddo
atk-s0403a40:8_8: suyyati, balavataro vāyāmo kātabbo hoti, evarūpā saddhāvimuttassa pubbabhāgamaggabhāvanā.
atk-s0403a40:8_9: Yathā pana sunisitena asinā kadaliṁ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṁ maṭṭhaṁ hoti, asi
atk-s0403a40:8_10: sīghaṁ vahati, saddo na suyyati, balavavāyāmakiccaṁ na hoti, evarūpā paññāvimuttassa
atk-s0403a40:9_0: Dhammaṁ anussaratīti dhammānusārī. Dhammoti paññā, paññāpubbaṅgamaṁ maggaṁ bhāvetīti
atk-s0403a40:9_1: attho. Saddhānusārimhipi eseva nayo. Ubhopete sotāpattimaggaṭṭhāyeva. Vuttampi cetaṁ
atk-s0403a40:9_3: hoti, paññāvāhiṁ paññāpubbaṅgamaṁ ariyamaggaṁ bhāveti. Ayaṁ vuccati puggalo dhammānusārī.
atk-s0403a40:9_4: Yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa saddhindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ
atk-s0403a40:9_5: hoti, saddhāvāhiṁ saddhāpubbaṅgamaṁ ariyamaggaṁ bhāveti. Ayaṁ vuccati puggalo saddhānusārī”ti.
atk-s0403a40:9_6: Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato panesā ubhatobhāgavimuttādikathā visuddhimagge paññābhāvanādhikāre
atk-s0403a40:11_0: 15. Pañcame udakūpamāti nimujjanādiākāraṁ gahetvā udakena upamitā. Sakiṁ nimuggoti
atk-s0403a40:11_1: ekavārameva nimuggo. Ekantakāḷakehīti niyatamicchādiṭṭhiṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Ummujjatīti
atk-s0403a40:11_2: uṭṭhahati. Sādhūti sobhanā bhaddakā. Hāyatiyevāti caṅkavāre āsittaudakaṁ viya parihāyateva.
atk-s0403a40:11_3: Ummujjitvā vipassati viloketīti uṭṭhahitvā gantabbadisaṁ vipassati viloketi. Pataratīti
atk-s0403a40:11_4: gantabbadisābhimukho tarati nāma. Paṭigādhappatto hotīti uṭṭhāya viloketvā pataritvā
atk-s0403a40:11_5: ekasmiṁ ṭhāne patiṭṭhāpatto nāma hoti, tiṭṭhati na punāgacchati. Tiṇṇopāraṅgato thale
atk-s0403a40:11_6: tiṭṭhatīti sabbakilesoghaṁ taritvā paratīraṁ gantvā nibbānathale patiṭṭhito nāma
atk-s0403a40:13_0: 16. Chaṭṭhe aniccāti evaṁ paññāya pharanto anupassatīti aniccānupassī. Aniccāti evaṁ
atk-s0403a40:13_1: saññā assāti aniccasaññī. Aniccāti evaṁ ñāṇena paṭisaṁveditā assāti aniccapaṭisaṁvedī.
atk-s0403a40:13_2: Satatanti sabbakālaṁ. Samitanti yathā purimacittena pacchimacittaṁ samitaṁ samupagataṁ
atk-s0403a40:13_3: ghaṭṭitaṁ hoti, evaṁ. Abbokiṇṇanti nirantaraṁ aññena cetasā asaṁmissaṁ. Cetasā adhimuccamānoti
atk-s0403a40:13_4: cittena sanniṭṭhāpayamāno. Paññāya pariyogāhamānoti vipassanāñāṇena anupavisamāno.
atk-s0403a40:14_0: Apubbaṁ acarimanti apure apacchā ekakkhaṇeyeva. Idha samasīsī kathito. So catubbidho
atk-s0403a40:14_1: hoti rogasamasīsī, vedanāsamasīsī, iriyāpathasamasīsī, jīvitasamasīsīti. Tattha yassa
atk-s0403a40:14_2: aññatarena rogena phuṭṭhassa sato rogavūpasamo ca āsavakkhayo ca ekappahāreneva hoti,
atk-s0403a40:14_3: ayaṁ rogasamasīsī nāma. Yassa pana aññataraṁ vedanaṁ vedayato vedanāvūpasamo ca āsavakkhayo
atk-s0403a40:14_4: ca ekappahāreneva hoti, ayaṁ vedanāsamasīsī nāma. Yassa pana ṭhānādīsu iriyāpathesu
atk-s0403a40:14_5: aññatarasamaṅgino vipassantassa iriyāpathassa pariyosānañca āsavakkhayo ca ekappahāreneva
atk-s0403a40:14_6: hoti, ayaṁ iriyāpathasamasīsī nāma. Yassa pana upakkamato vā sarasato vā jīvitapariyādānañca
atk-s0403a40:14_7: āsavakkhayo ca ekappahāreneva hoti, ayaṁ jīvitasamasīsī nāma. Ayamidha adhippeto.
atk-s0403a40:14_8: Tattha kiñcāpi āsavapariyādānaṁ maggacittena, jīvitapariyādānaṁ cuticittena hotīti
atk-s0403a40:14_9: ubhinnaṁ ekakkhaṇe sambhavo nāma natthi. Yasmā panassa āsavesu khīṇamattesu paccavekkhaṇavārānantarameva
atk-s0403a40:14_10: jīvitapariyādānaṁ gacchati, antaraṁ na paññāyati, tasmā evaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-s0403a40:15_0: Antarāparinibbāyīti yo pañcasu suddhāvāsesu yattha katthaci uppanno nibbattakkhaṇe
atk-s0403a40:15_1: vā thokaṁ atikkamitvā vā vemajjhe ṭhatvā vā arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti, tassetaṁ nāmaṁ. Upahaccaparinibbāyīti
atk-s0403a40:15_2: yo tattheva āyuvemajjhaṁ atikkamitvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti. Asaṅkhāraparinibbāyīti yo
atk-s0403a40:15_3: tesaṁyeva puggalānaṁ asaṅkhāreneva appayogena kilese khepeti. Sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyīti
atk-s0403a40:15_4: yo sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilese khepeti. Uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti yo heṭṭhā
atk-s0403a40:15_5: catūsu suddhāvāsesu yattha katthaci nibbattitvā tato cuto anupubbena akaniṭṭhe uppajjitvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0403a40:17_0: 17-19. Sattame dukkhānupassīti pīḷanākāraṁ dukkhato anupassanto. Aṭṭhame anattānupassīti
atk-s0403a40:17_1: avasavattanākāraṁ anattāti anupassanto. Navame sukhānupassīti sukhanti evaṁ ñāṇena anupassanto.
atk-s0403a40:19_0: 20. Dasame niddasavatthūnīti niddasādivatthūni, “niddaso bhikkhu, nibbīso, nittiṁso,
atk-s0403a40:19_1: niccattālīso, nippaññāso”ti evaṁ vacanakāraṇāni. Ayaṁ kira pañho titthiyasamaye uppanno.
atk-s0403a40:19_2: Titthiyā hi dasavassakāle mataṁ nigaṇṭhaṁ niddasoti vadanti. So kira puna dasavasso
atk-s0403a40:19_3: na hoti. Na kevalañca dasavasso, navavassopi ekavassopi na hoti. Eteneva nayena vīsativassādikālepi
atk-s0403a40:19_4: mataṁ nigaṇṭhaṁ “nibbīso nittiṁso niccattālīso nippaññāso”ti vadanti. Āyasmā ānando
atk-s0403a40:19_5: gāme vicaranto taṁ kathaṁ sutvā vihāraṁ gantvā bhagavato ārocesi. Bhagavā āha – “na
atk-s0403a40:19_6: idaṁ, ānanda, titthiyānaṁ adhivacanaṁ, mama sāsane khīṇāsavassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Khīṇāsavo
atk-s0403a40:19_7: hi dasavassakāle parinibbuto puna dasavasso na hoti. Na kevalañca dasavassova, navavassopi…pe…
atk-s0403a40:19_8: ekavassopi. Na kevalañca ekavassova, ekādasamāsikopi…pe… ekamāsikopi ekamuhuttikopi
atk-s0403a40:19_9: na hotiyeva”. Kasmā? Puna paṭisandhiyā abhāvā. Nibbīsādīsupi eseva nayo. Iti bhagavā
atk-s0403a40:19_10: “mama sāsane khīṇāsavassetaṁ adhivacana”nti vatvā yehi kāraṇehi niddaso hoti, tāni
atk-s0403a40:20_0: Tattha idhāti imasmiṁ sāsane. Sikkhāsamādāne tibbacchando hotīti sikkhāttayapūraṇe
atk-s0403a40:20_1: balavacchando hoti. Āyatiñca sikkhāsamādāne avigatapemoti anāgate punadivasādīsupi
atk-s0403a40:20_2: sikkhāpūraṇe avigatapemeneva samannāgato hoti. Dhammanisantiyāti dhammanisāmanāya.
atk-s0403a40:20_3: Vipassanāyetaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Icchāvinayeti taṇhāvinaye. Paṭisallāneti ekībhāve. Vīriyārambheti
atk-s0403a40:20_4: kāyikacetasikassa vīriyassa pūraṇe. Satinepakketi satiyañceva nipakabhāve. Diṭṭhipaṭivedheti
